datasheets.name: Mokhryst the Mindflenser

other.name: Harbinger of Despair
other.description: Once per turn, at the start of your Command, Movement, Shooting, Charge or Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the test when it does so.

datasheets.fluff: A master of fear, Mokhryst is a Psychomancer whose Cryptek peers share a wary repugnance of her association with the most cursed of Necrons. With degraded horrors at her command, she instils yet greater terror in her victims’ minds through phantasms and hard-light constructs.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: IMMORTALS.
datasheets.loadout: ■ This model is equipped with: abyssal lance.

datasheets.name: Immortals

other.name: Implacable Eradication
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

datasheets.fluff: Once the shock troops of the Necrontyr, Immortals still provide their masters with a powerful core of skilled soldiery aeons later. They can employ a number of strategies even without command, and their firepower makes them deadly in close or midrange engagements.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: gauss blaster; close combat weapon.

datasheets.name: Flayed Ones
datasheets.fluff: Flayed Ones keen shrill hunting cries as they fall upon the foe. Infected with the gruesome Flayer virus, they attempt to gorge themselves upon the blood of their butchered foes, gore drizzling through their mechanical forms as they seek to slake a thirst they can never quench.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: flayer claws.

datasheets.name: Ophydian Destroyers
datasheets.fluff: Repugnant to other Necrons, Ophydian Destroyers echo elements of Canoptek Wraiths and Flayed Ones in their bodies. Tunnelling through solid ferrocrete with frenzied violence and flickers of dimensional displacement, they burst into view to ambush, hack and rend their prey apart.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: Ophydian hyperphase weapons.

stratagems.name: Extermination Directive
stratagems.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that target is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.
stratagems.fluff: With flensing energies or betaloned extremities, the Necrons wordlessly enact a cull of the foe, exploiting their panic and indecision to tear them apart before they can regroup.

stratagems.name: Prowling Efficiency
stratagems.target: One NECRONS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.effect: After that enemy unit ends that Fall Back move, your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
stratagems.fluff: Even as one foe scatters in terror, the Necrons exploit the breakdown of cohesion to reprioritise their threat protocols and lurch onwards in search of new prey.

stratagems.name: Eldritch Nightmares
stratagems.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if it is within 12" of your unit.
stratagems.fluff: To focus one’s attention on the deathly visages of the Necrons is to confront the full horror of these ancient killing machines. Trigger fingers tremble, and targeting priorities are forgotten as fear consumes would-be assassins.

enhancements.name: Neuroflense Protocols
enhancements.description:
The bearer’s weapons have:

■ The [PRECISION] ability.
■ An Attacks characteristic of 3 while targeting a Battle-shocked unit, and each time the bearer makes an attack that targets such a unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Shambling Resurrection
enhancements.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot, if one or more models from the bearer’s unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, the bearer’s unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.
